name: 惑星ΩのＱ王子
summary: Space explorers from Earth discovered a strange cosmic object: a giant pumpkin nearing the planet. Upon establishing contact with the pumpkin, they discovered that this vessel belonged to Prince Q from the planet Omega. The planet's super-computer (with a powerful 4 MhZ processor) determined that the prince has to get married. In order to do that, he has to descend onto Earth and find a suitable candidate - naturally after having conducted a thorough sexual examination.
info:
• 原画: OKI、林家志弦
  • 别名: Mirror
  • 平台: PC98
  • 发行日期: 1996-09-12
  • ブランド: studio tinkle
  • シナリオ: 秋まさき
  • プログラム: kenji
  • 音楽: 小早川 哲哉
